thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Beneteau Announces 2017-2018 Trends‍​

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Beneteau Announces 2017-2018 Trends‍​
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - BENETEAU SA:
* 2017-2018 TRENDS, CONSOLIDATED REVENUE GROWTH OF 6%-8% (REPORTED DATA), 8%-10% (CONSTANT EXCHANGE RATES)‍​
* 2017-2018 INVESTMENTS ARE UP +20% FROM THE PREVIOUS YEAR’S FIGURE OF €78.8M‍​
* 2017-2018 TRENDS RATE OF INCOME FROM ORDINARY OPERATIONS IS EXPECTED TO BE STABLE ON A REPORTED BASIS
* CONFIRMS TARGET ANNOUNCED OF 8% TO 8.5% INCOME FROM ORDINARY OPERATIONS IN 2020. Source text: bit.ly/2GY4q50 Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom:)
